definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be small, insignificant (NH Hiph. and deriv., Syr. qt.am; OAram. [[קטין]] insignificant; Ar. qat.iyn parum edens; Eth. qat.ana: be thin, chiefly in deriv.; prob. also As. kuṭṭinnu, small, younger, Zehnpf:BAS i.505 (otherwise Xl:HWB323); Meissn:Suppi. Ḳatânu, be short (of hair), cf. Bez:ZA viii, 141 f.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[קָטׂנְתִּי]] Ge 32:11, c. [[מִן]] comp., I am too insignificant for all the kindnesses; Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּקְמַן זאׁת בְּעֵינֶיךָ]] 2Sa 7:19 = 1Ch 17:17.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: lit. Inf. cstr. [[לְהַקְטִין]] Am 8:5 making ephah small.
